testcase.name: When I am logged in as the default administrator
Then I click on the View Profile link
And I retrieve the creation date
When I navigate to the System Settings page
Then I set the Time Zone to "PST"
And I submit the changes to System Settings
Then The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
And The Time Zone is set to "PST"
Then I click on the View Profile link
And I verify that the creation date has changed with the Time Zone
When I navigate to the System Settings page
Then I set the Time Zone to "EST"
And I submit the changes to System Settings
Then The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
And The Time Zone is set to "EST"
Then I click on the View Profile link
And I verify that the creation date has changed with the Time Zone
